label: 八難
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: Hachinan, eight places or situations in which one is unable to see the Buddha or hear the dharma (Hell, world of beasts, state of blindness or deafness, etc.) (p. 566n).
